long_description: das maritime hotel in stade. die beste lage im herzen von stade bietet ihnen eine große auswahl an attraktiven zielen. wenn sie beruflich in stade unterwegs sind, bietet sich unser hotel aufgrund der verkehrsgünstigen lage an. ganz nach dem motto "gute zeit. das hotel verfügt über kostenfreie hotelparkplätze ohne höhenbeschränkung für pkw, transporter, wohnmobile und busse. pkw parken auf p1 und p2, transporter, wohnmobile und busse auf p2. ihr hotel - zentral in stade.

generated_description: hotel stadthafen stade is a maritime hotel located in the heart of stade, germany. the hotel offers 55 modern hotel rooms and 8 air-conditioned apartments with kitchenettes and balconies, as well as a restaurant, aloha restaurant stade. the restaurant serves breakfast with a view of the harbor and is open year-round. the rooms and apartments are equipped with free wi-fi, parking for up to 4 people, and some offer harbor views. the location of the hotel is central and offers easy access to the city's attractions, including the old town and the old walled villages. the airport is easily accessible by bike or car and is within a few minutes' drive to the alte land with its beautiful craftsman-made houses, apple orchards, and spectacular cherry and apple blossom blossoms in the morning. the hotel stadthaft stade also offers conference rooms and event spaces for conferences and meetings.
